column2: "Ɔhen Darius n’afe a otsia ebien no mu bosoom a otsia esia no ne
column4: EWURADZE n’asɛm nam nkɔnhyɛnyi Hagai do baa Juda ambrado Zerubabel
column6: na Jehozadak ne ba ɔsɔfopanyin Josua hɔ

column2: "Mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE kasa se nye yi
column5: Onndur ber a yɛba besi EWURADZE fi."

column2: "Nna EWURADZE n’asɛm nam nkɔnhyɛnyi Hagai do bae
column6: ber edu ama hom dɛ hom tsena hom efi a wɔasesɛw enyi mu
column7: ber a ofi yi adan afo yi?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi: Hom ndwendwen dza ɔrokɔ do wɔ hom asetsena mu yi ho yie."

column3: naaso kakrabaabi na hom nya fi mu; hom dzidzi
column4: naaso hom mmee; hom nom nsa
column5: naaso ɔnnso hom; hom furafura atam
column6: naaso hom ho nnyɛ hom hyew; na nyia onya akatua no gye akatua no gu foto ntokurntokur mu."

column2: "Mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi: Afei hom ndwendwen hom akwan ho yie;"
"na hom mfow mbepɔw no nkɛfa ndua mbesi dan no: na ɔbɛyɛ me fɛw na mahyɛ mo ho enyimnyam wɔ mu

column4: obowiee ketseabaa bi; na hom dze baa fie no
column5: muhuwii guu do. Ebɛnadze ntsi a? Dɔm EWURADZE na ɔse. Osian me fi a ɔadan afo
column6: na hom dze hom esiesie hom efiefi ntsi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom ntsi na ɔsor esianka dɛ ɔbɔsu nntɔ

column7: na dza asaase dze ba do

column5: wɔnye ɔman ne nkaa no nyina
column6: wotsiee EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn ne ndze
column7: na nkɔnhyɛnyi Hagai ne nsɛm no
column8: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn somaa no no; na ɔman no suroi wɔ EWURADZE enyim."

column4: bɔɔ EWURADZE n’amandzɛɛ no kyerɛɛ ɔman no

column6: no sunsum na ɔman nkaa no nyina hɔn sunsum; na wɔbɛyɛɛ edwuma wɔ dɔm EWURADZE
column9: "wɔ bosoom a otsia esia no ne da a otsia eduonu anan no mu
column10: wɔ ɔhen Darius n’afe a otsia ebien no mu."
